timeline.bodyText: Should be Whether or not to reset the config.yml.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: Should have a second language string saying the config.yml was reset to default.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: I'd add an alias for townyperms as well here.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: The subcommands should be broken down into 5 options, one subcommand per line the fourth "" is actually meant for translatable help descriptions explaining what each does. Add on an "all" option.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: Switch needs an "all" option for reloading everything all at once.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: Reset is supposed to only reset the config.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.message: Fix some errors, and make lang load with config.

Merge branch 'master' into refactor/reload
